definition[0]: used to say that you do not think something is as important as someone else thinks it is
example[0]: It’s just a game. If you lose, big deal.
example[1]: What’s the big deal? It’s only a birthday, not the end of the world.
example[2]: It’s no big deal. Everybody forgets things sometimes.
definition[1]: an important or exciting event or situation
example[3]: This audition is a big deal for Joey.
